Package jam.data.control

Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CalibrationDisplay Displays a calibration function.
CalibrationFit Class to control the histograms Allows one to zero the histograms and create new histograms
DataControl A class to do overall control of the Jam data classes.
GainShift Class for adjusting the gain of 1d spectra.
GateControl Class to set 1 D and 2 D gates.
HistogramControl Class to control the histograms Allows one to zero the histograms and create new histograms
Manipulations Class for projecting 2-D histograms.
MonitorControl Reads and displays the monitors.
ParameterControl Sets and displays the Parameters (data.Parameters.class) used for sorting
PlotBar Class that is a bar graph used by monitors
Projections Class for projecting 2-D histograms.
ScalerControl Reads and displays the scaler values.
 

Package jam.data.control Description

Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters.
